item.title: Trump sends border czar to Minnesota and says he and governor are now on a ‘similar wavelength’
item.description: A federal judge is considering Minnesota’s challenge to the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.

item.title: Businesses face pressure to respond to immigration enforcement while also becoming a target of it
In their words: An examination of statements Trump officials made about what led to Pretti’s death
